Package gamelogic

Class Species

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.Element
      • gamelogic.Species
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Species
extends Element
    A species represents a group of homogeneous entities, which all behave according to the same rules. At each frame it can generate new entities.
    See Also:
    Entity, GenerationRule, Element, Serialized Form
